item.description: Introduction: My Story 1. The Surprising Power of Atomic Habits Introduction: My Story My Summary If I have to succeed personally, professionally, I have to choose the right habit, and positive thoughts. item.title: Harry Lorayne
item.description: Pegs Pegs Identify the pegs which are difficult to remember. Make use of images to remember those pegs Also try to make your own pegs, the first peg that comes to your mind. item.title: Remember The Book You Read
item.description: Remember The Book You Read The 6 SIMPLE HACKS To Remember EVERYTHING You Read Remember The Book You Read Remember What You Read - How To Memorize What You Read! Don’t try to memorize as you read but instead highlight or underline the key words Use the Mind Palace technique Create pictures for all the words you have highlighted or underlines See these pictures in your mind palace Segment chapters by using rooms Create pictures for dates if it is a history book The 6 SIMPLE HACKS To Remember EVERYTHING You Read Blinkist Mind Map Three Ps Model Person - The Person in story Principle - What is the Principle I can learn Practical Application - How to turn it into Practical step.
